00031 // we declare all of the MultiTouch stuff in Win7 here to prevent requiring users to use the Win7 headers
00032 #if ! defined( WM_TOUCH )
00033 DECLARE_HANDLE(HTOUCHINPUT);
00034 typedef struct tagTOUCHINPUT {
00035     LONG x;
00036     LONG y;
00037     HANDLE hSource;
00038     DWORD dwID;
00039     DWORD dwFlags;
00040     DWORD dwMask;
00041     DWORD dwTime;
00042     ULONG_PTR dwExtraInfo;
00043     DWORD cxContact;
00044     DWORD cyContact;
00045 } TOUCHINPUT, *PTOUCHINPUT;
00046 typedef TOUCHINPUT const * PCTOUCHINPUT;
00047 #define TOUCH_COORD_TO_PIXEL(l)         ((l) / 100)
00048 #define WM_TOUCH                        0x0240
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 namespace cinder { namespace app {
00052 
00053 class AppImplMsw {
00054  public:
00055     AppImplMsw( class App *aApp ) : mApp( aApp ), mWindowOffset( 0, 0 ) {}
00056     virtual ~AppImplMsw() {}
00057     
00058     int             getWindowWidth() const { return mWindowWidth; }
00059     int             getWindowHeight() const { return mWindowHeight; }
00060     virtual void    setWindowWidth( int aWindowWidth ) { }
00061     virtual void    setWindowHeight( int aWindowHeight ) { }
00062     virtual void    setWindowSize( int aWindowWidth, int aWindowHeight ) {}
00063     float           getFrameRate() const { return mFrameRate; }
00064     virtual float   setFrameRate( float aFrameRate ) { return -1.0f; }
00065     bool            isFullScreen() const { return mFullScreen; }
00066     virtual void    toggleFullScreen() {}
00067     virtual Vec2i   mouseLocation();
00068     virtual void    quit() = 0;
00069     
00070     virtual void    privateSetWindowOffset__( const Vec2i &aWindowOffset ) { mWindowOffset = aWindowOffset; }
00071     
00072     
00073     static void hideCursor();
00074     static void showCursor();
00075     
00076     static Buffer   loadResource( int id, const std::string &type );
00077     
00078     static std::string  getAppPath();   
00079     static std::string  getOpenFilePath( const std::string &initialPath, std::vector<std::string> extensions );
00080     static std::string  getSaveFilePath( const std::string &initialPath, std::vector<std::string> extensions );
00081     static std::string  getFolderPath( const std::string &initialPath );
00082     
00083  protected:
00084     class App   *mApp;
00085     int         mWindowWidth, mWindowHeight;    
00086     bool        mFullScreen;
00087     Vec2i       mWindowOffset;
00088     float       mFrameRate; 
00089 };
00090 
00091 } } // namespace cinder::app
